Text:
Thx Dean, 
My Niece in UK put on her FB page that David Platt  gives his wife  flowers in a sauce bottle...PMSL.

Hi. Got my mum here in Saigon from Liverpool and we just got back from a two week trip around SE Asia. First thing she wanted me to do when we got home an hour ago was download all the missed episodes of Corrie. Thanks Dean for putting them on, and heres to our Corrie Fest tomorrow!
HI Dean. Just popping in to say hi and thanks for all the great access to Corrie. Don't know what we would do without you. Surely there is special spot in the Snug of Heaven reserved just for you ;-)
